**Linguala** now has a cleaner, more focused interface that gets straight to the translation functionality. The domain selection buttons are prominently displayed without the marketing copy, creating a more streamlined user experience.

The app now opens directly to the core functionality - just like how users expect a professional translation tool to work. Clean, minimal, and focused on getting the job done efficiently.
